Text: bedankt. late dvd release? film is intussen toch al 1 jaar oud?

@ touchwoodblues there's one with English subtitles:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6861913/Sint.2010.544p.English_subtitled_by_CBCS.SH_R.avi#filelistContainer

You can also download all sorts of subtitles from http://www.opensubtitles.org/nl. If you use the free mediaplayer VLC you can ad the .srt files from that site to your movie. Good luck!
